item.title: Re: Terri isn't being hot enough
item.content:encoded:
Wastelands is doable at Season 1. Difficult and frustrating, but doable. Unfortunately Ro-Sham-Bo (2) doesn't work in Wastelands. The only allies that work in wastelands that you don't get from Wastelands are Haus, SNAKEMAN, Haro, Larry, and Proof Reader. Minion for Life (Haus+SNAKEMAN) is probably your best initial Wastelands team in Season 1. You will want to be at least Jonin (for the extra range) before seriously trying Wastelands.

It's expensive, but you can use Chasers (Juice Bar) to increase drop rate. However, I don't think Shammy 2 is required for anything but Ro-Sham-Bo 2.

item.title: Re: Terri isn't being hot enough
item.content:encoded:
RNGs _do_ hate me, but I'm on about 60 missions with her now and no luck. That's pretty ridiculous. D:

No good Ally Drop boosters for a season 1 Special Jonin, then? SBYN is a season 2 theme according to the Wikidot, and I Need This is part of the Wasteland missions, which from what I've seen on the wiki don't look particularly doable without either the Ro'Sham'Bo-2 team (which is what I'm _trying_ to get) or some permanent items I shouldn't have yet.

item.title: Re: Terri isn't being hot enough
item.content:encoded: Her drop rate isn't very high, and if you don't use anything to boost it (Stand By Your Ninja theme, I Need This jutsu), you're leaving yourself wide open to RNG hate.
